item.title: 'I'd take him back in a heartbeat' - which players return to haunt their former clubs?
item.description: After Brighton's Danny Welbeck scored again against Manchester United on Sunday, who has the best record against their former clubs in the Premier Lea...

item.title: Fed chair Powell hits out at 'unprecedented' probe by US justice department
item.description: Jerome Powell said he believed the investigation was due to Donald Trump's anger over the Fed's refusal to cut interest rates.

item.title: Man admits causing golf course crash death
item.description: Suzanne Cherry, 62, died four days after she was hit by a van involved in a police pursuit.

item.title: Former Tory Chancellor Nadhim Zahawi defects to Reform UK
item.description: The former MP says the UK needs "glorious revolution", as the Conservatives describe Reform as a "party of has-been politicians".

item.title: UFC wants to make Pimblett champion - Tsarukyan
item.description: Arman Tsarukyan was overlooked for the interim lightweight title despite being the division's number one contender.
